results.title: Metformin decreases testicular damages following ischaemia/reperfusion injury in rats.
results.text_hl: ...The effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ on a @<m>DISEASE_Spermatic_Cord_Torsion</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013086 @@@testicular torsion injury@@@ in adolescent @SPECIES_10116 @@@rat@@@ testis after @DISEASE_Ring_Chromosome_20_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:C580424 @@@I/R@@@ were evaluated in the present study.

citations.NLM: Sarıbal D, Erdem E, Güngör-Ordueri NE, Usta A, Karakuş C, Karacan M. Metformin decreases testicular damages following ischaemia/reperfusion injury in rats. Andrologia. 2020 Mar;52(2):e13481. PMID: 31815318

results.title: Synergistic effect of rapamycin and metformin against germ cell apoptosis and oxidative stress after testicular torsion/detorsion-induced ischemia/reperfusion in rats.
results.text_hl: Synergistic effect of @CHEMICAL_Sirolimus @CHEMICAL_MESH:D020123 @@@rapamycin@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ against germ cell apoptosis and oxidative stress after @<m>DISEASE_Spermatic_Cord_Torsion</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013086 @@@testicular torsion@@@/detorsion-induced @DISEASE_Ischemia @DISEASE_MESH:D007511 @@@ischemia@@@/reperfusion in @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@.

citations.NLM: Ghasemnejad-Berenji M, Ghazi-Khansari M, Pashapour S, Jafari A, Yazdani I, Ghasemnejad-Berenji H, Saeedi Saravi SS, Sadeghpour S, Nobakht M, Abdollahi A, Mohajer Ansari J, Dehpour AR. Synergistic effect of rapamycin and metformin against germ cell apoptosis and oxidative stress after testicular torsion/detorsion-induced ischemia/reperfusion in rats.
